TopicTitle: Consulta sobre algun tipo de mod.

Articles.Content:
Hola. No se en donde realizar esta consulta, pero...

Existe algun mod con el que uno pueda generar o construir algun componente aunque sea por unidad y con limite de volumen, estando fuera del centro kerbal?

Como un modulo fabrica que necesite ore e ingenieros para funcionar. Y que se pueda llevar a una base en duna o mun.

Alguien sabe sobre creacion de mods o conoce a alguien que le interese la propuesta de un nuevo modulo o componente "fabrica" para el ksp?

Aviso que yo utilizo la version 1.4.2 del juego.  Pero me interesa saber de cualquier mod para cualquier version.

 

Quote

Hi. I do not know where to make this query, but ... Is there any mod with which one can generate or build a component even if it is per unit and with volume limit, being outside the kerbal center? As a module manufactures you need to pray and engineers to function. And that can be carried to a base in dune or mun. Does anyone know about creation of mods or know someone who is interested in the proposal of a new module or component "factory" for the ksp? Notice that I use version 1.4.2 of the game. But I'm interested in knowing any mod for any version. 

 

Edited January 10, 2019 by Vanamonde

I have moved your post to the correct sub, and welcome to our forum  

We do ask our members to post in English outside of the international subs, though, so I've google translated your post.

Greetings, @Aaroneytor98

I believe the mod you are looking for is ExtraPlanetary Launchpads

 

Saludos, @Aaroneytor98

Creo que el mod que estás buscando es Launchpads ExtraPlanetary

 

Edited January 10, 2019 by Geonovast
Translation
